snippet: The small Off Off Broadway Flea Theater and a powerful Hollywood agency are talking about mounting "The Parisian Woman," a new play about sexual politics in Washington, in a larger space than the Flea.
abstract: The small Off Off Broadway Flea Theater and a powerful Hollywood agency are talking about mounting "The Parisian Woman," a new play about sexual politics in Washington, in a larger space than the Flea.

headline.main: Battle Brewing Over Where to Stage Beau Willimon Play
